product_overview: A professional, premium, data-driven consultancy website for VR Next Gen Solutions showcasing services, clients, team, and contact routes with a sleek black & gold brand aesthetic, modern animations, and optimized performance.
core_goals: Create a high-quality, trust-inspiring web presence that converts visitors to leads.
Present services and case studies with clear, data-driven storytelling.
Deliver a responsive and accessible user experience optimized for desktop and mobile.
Develop a modular, extensible architecture supporting future features like CMS and analytics.
key_features: Home page with animated hero section featuring typed headline and scroll-fading hero image overlay.
About page presenting mission, vision, team profiles, and animated counters.
Our Clients page with interactive 3D desktop circular carousel and mobile scroll carousel showing clients logos and case snippets.
Services page with animated service tiles linking to detailed service descriptions.
Validated contact form integrating API and company details with map embed and social links.
Global responsive header navigation with dual-action menu and smooth scroll to sections.
Site-wide layered animated background system with subtle gold grid lines, aurora blobs, and cursor-reactive shine.
Footer with magic brick reveal animation triggered on hover/tap revealing contact/social content.
Comprehensive accessibility and SEO including semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, focus states, ARIA attributes, and optimized meta tags.
Performance optimizations including ScrollManager batching scroll listeners, lazy loading images, code splitting, and adapting heavy animations for mobile.
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage and sees animated hero with data-driven headline and CTAs.
User navigates via header to About, Services, Clients, or Contact pages.
On Clients page, desktop users interact with 3D rotating carousel; mobile users scroll vertical carousel with animations.
Users fill and submit validated contact form with real-time feedback and confirmation.
Hovering or tapping the footer triggers reveal animation with social links and contact information.
Navigation menu allows smooth scrolling to sections and dropdown expansion with keyboard support.
validation_criteria: All pages render correctly with matching content and design specs.
Header navigation works with dual-action menu and accessible keyboard interaction.
Hero animations and scroll-fading image function smoothly and disabled on mobile if required.
Carousels present and animate correctly on desktop and mobile devices with smooth interactions.
Contact form validates input correctly and successfully submits via API.
Footer reveal animation triggers and resets appropriately on desktop and mobile.
Performance targets met: â‰¤ 500ms main thread JS load time, 60 FPS animations, optimized LCP/FCP.
Accessibility standards met: semantic HTML, keyboard focus states, WCAG AA contrast, ARIA attributes.
Cross-browser and responsive testing confirms consistent layout and no overlap on device sizes.
CI/CD pipelines run linting, testing, and build steps with successful deployment to staging and production.
